annotations.description: In This video we dive into a few recipes which can be found in our good friend Dave Stolte's book Home Bar Basics And Not So Basics. The book fits each recipe i...
annotations.title: Slings, Sours, Grogs and Nogs

textContent:
1oz (30ml) White Rum
.5oz (15ml) Gin
.75oz (22.5ml) Lime Juice
Top Coca-Cola
Mint Wedge Garnish

Shake and strain into collins glass over ice
Top with cola and garnish

title: Cuba Libre Preparado
